description: The pirate game is a simple mathematical game. It is a multi-player version of the ultimatum game.The pirate world's rules of distribution are thus: that the most senior pirate should propose a distribution of coins. The pirates, including the proposer, then vote on whether to accept this distribution. In case of a tie vote, the proposer has the casting vote. If the distribution is accepted, the coins are disbursed and the game ends.

portfolio.name: Do you think you have good knowledge about logos? Come and unleash your potential. The competition is all about the logos and related slogans. All you have to do is guess the logos or slogans.

Student's club Math Pirates is organising a workshop on Vedic Mathematics as per the demands of students on the account of National Science day, by Mr. Anuj Gupta, a renowned faculty from chandigarh having more than 9 years experience
